name: metrics_snapwm
description: Metrics snapshot for the snapwm tile

accounts_loaded.description: Number of accounts seen during snapshot loading. Includes duplicates. Resets if snapshot load restarts

accounts_replaced.description: Number of previously inserted accounts replaced by a later duplicate. Resets if snapshot load restarts

accounts_ignored.description: Number of stale duplicate accounts dropped because a previously inserted account was newer. Resets if snapshot load restarts

accounts_active.description: Current number of accounts in index. Resets if snapshot load restarts
